00028   MinetInit(MINET_MONITOR);

00030   reader = MinetIsModuleMonitored(MINET_READER) ? MinetAccept(MINET_READER) : MINET_NOHANDLE;
00031   writer = MinetIsModuleMonitored(MINET_WRITER) ? MinetAccept(MINET_WRITER) : MINET_NOHANDLE;
00032   device = MinetIsModuleMonitored(MINET_DEVICE_DRIVER) ? MinetAccept(MINET_DEVICE_DRIVER) : MINET_NOHANDLE;
00033   ethermux = MinetIsModuleMonitored(MINET_ETHERNET_MUX) ? MinetAccept(MINET_ETHERNET_MUX) : MINET_NOHANDLE;
00034   ip= MinetIsModuleMonitored(MINET_IP_MODULE) ? MinetAccept(MINET_IP_MODULE) : MINET_NOHANDLE;
00035   arp= MinetIsModuleMonitored(MINET_ARP_MODULE) ? MinetAccept(MINET_ARP_MODULE) : MINET_NOHANDLE;
00036   other= MinetIsModuleMonitored(MINET_OTHER_MODULE) ? MinetAccept(MINET_OTHER_MODULE) : MINET_NOHANDLE;
00037   ipmux= MinetIsModuleMonitored(MINET_IP_MUX) ? MinetAccept(MINET_IP_MUX) : MINET_NOHANDLE;
00038   ipother=MinetIsModuleMonitored(MINET_IP_OTHER_MODULE) ? MinetAccept(MINET_IP_OTHER_MODULE) : MINET_NOHANDLE;
00039   icmp=MinetIsModuleMonitored(MINET_ICMP_MODULE) ? MinetAccept(MINET_ICMP_MODULE) : MINET_NOHANDLE;
00040   udp=MinetIsModuleMonitored(MINET_UDP_MODULE) ? MinetAccept(MINET_UDP_MODULE) : MINET_NOHANDLE;
00041   tcp=MinetIsModuleMonitored(MINET_TCP_MODULE) ? MinetAccept(MINET_TCP_MODULE) : MINET_NOHANDLE;

00043   socklib=MinetIsModuleMonitored(MINET_SOCKLIB_MODULE) ? MinetAccept(MINET_SOCKLIB_MODULE) : MINET_NOHANDLE;
00044   app=MinetIsModuleMonitored(MINET_APP) ? MinetAccept(MINET_APP) : MINET_NOHANDLE;
00045 
00046   MinetEvent myevent;
00047   MinetMonitoringEventDescription desc;
00048 
00049   MinetEvent event;
00050   MinetMonitoringEvent monevent;
00051   RawEthernetPacket rawpacket;
00052   Packet packet;
00053   SockRequestResponse srr;
00054   SockLibRequestResponse slrr;
00055   ARPRequestResponse arr;
00056 
00057 
00058   cerr << "monitor running\n";
00059 
00060   while (MinetGetNextEvent(myevent)==0) {
00061     if (myevent.eventtype!=MinetEvent::Dataflow || myevent.direction!=MinetEvent::IN) {
00062       cerr << "Ignoring this event: "<<myevent<<endl;
00063     } else {
00064       MinetReceive(myevent.handle,desc);
00065       cerr << std::setprecision(20) << desc << " : ";
00066       switch (desc.datatype) {
00067       case MINET_EVENT:
00068         MinetReceive(myevent.handle,event);
00069         cerr << event << endl;
00070         break;
00071       case MINET_MONITORINGEVENT:
00072         MinetReceive(myevent.handle,monevent);
00073         cerr << monevent << endl;
00074         break;
00075       case MINET_RAWETHERNETPACKET:
00076         MinetReceive(myevent.handle,rawpacket);
00077         cerr << rawpacket << endl;
00078         break;
00079       case MINET_PACKET:
00080         MinetReceive(myevent.handle,packet);
00081         cerr << packet << endl;
00082         break;
00083       case MINET_ARPREQUESTRESPONSE:
00084         MinetReceive(myevent.handle,arr);
00085         cerr << arr << endl;
00086         break;
00087       case MINET_SOCKREQUESTRESPONSE:
00088         MinetReceive(myevent.handle,srr);
00089         cerr << srr << endl;
00090         break;
00091       case MINET_SOCKLIBREQUESTRESPONSE:
00092         MinetReceive(myevent.handle,slrr);
00093         cerr << slrr << endl;
00094         break;
00095       case MINET_NONE:
00096       default:
00097         break;
00098       }
00099     }
00100   }
00101   MinetDeinit();
00102 }
